surfinpy.p_vs_t¶

Functions related to the generation of surface phase diagrams as a function of pressure and temperature

surfinpy.p_vs_t.calculate(stoich, data, SE, adsorbant, thermochem, coverage=None)[source]¶

collects input variables and intitialises the calculation. :param stoich: information about the stoichiometric surface :type stoich: dictionary :param data: list of dictionaries containing information on the “adsorbed” surfaces :type data: list :param SE: surface energy of the stoichiomteric surface :type SE: float :param adsorbant: dft energy of adsorbing species :type adsorbant: float :param coverage: Numpy array containing the different coverages of adsorbant. :type coverage: array like :param thermochem: Numpy array containing thermochemcial data downloaded from NIST_JANAF

for the adsorbing species.
surfinpy.p_vs_t.calculate_adsorption_energy(data, stoich, thermochem)[source]¶

From the dft data provided - calculate the adsorbation energy :param data: list of dictionaries containing info about each calculation :type data: list :param stoich: info about the stoichiometric surface calculation :type stoich: dict :param termochem: dft energy of adsorbing species :type termochem: float

Returns:AE – Adsorbtion energy of adsorbing species in each calculation
Return type:array like
surfinpy.p_vs_t.calculate_surface_energy(AE, lnP, T, coverage, SE, data, nsurfaces)[source]¶

Calculate the surface energy as a function of pressure and temperature for each surface calculation. :param AE: list of adsorption energies :type AE: list :param lnP: full pressure range :type lnP: array like :param T: full temperature range :type T: array like :param coverage: surface coverage of adsorbing species in each calculation :type coverage: array like :param SE: surface energy of stoichiomteric surface :type SE: float :param data: list of dictionaries containing info on each surface :type data: list :param nsurfaces: total number of surfaces :type nsurfaces: int

Returns:SE_array – array of integers corresponding to lowest surface energies
Return type:array like
surfinpy.p_vs_t.inititalise(thermochem, adsorbant)[source]¶

initialise the arrays :param thermochem: array containing NIST_JANAF thermochemical data :type thermochem: array like :param adsorbant: dft energy of adsorbing species :type adsorbant: float

Returns:
  • lnP (array like) – numpy array of pressure values
  • logP (array like) – log of lnP
  • T (array like) – array of temperature values
  • adsrobant (array like) – dft values of adsorbant scaled to temperature
surfinpy.p_vs_t.vectorize(AE, lnP, T)[source]¶

Create 2D arrays of adsorption energy, temperature and pressure values :param AE: adsorption energies at varying temerature :type AE: array like :param lnP: Pressure range :type lnP: array like :param T: Temperature range :type T: array like

Returns:
  • xnew (array like) – 2D array of temeoerature values
  • ynew (array like) – 2D array of pressure values
  • A (array like) – 2D array of adsorption energies
